techmeme.title: Analysis: Google faces €12B+ in damage claims from dozens of EU price comparison websites that allege it stole their customers, after a €2.4B EU fine in 2017 (Karin Matussek/Bloomberg)
Sources: investors in US chipmaker Wolfspeed offered ~$600M to refinance a large convertible bond coming due in 2026, to pre-empt a potential bankruptcy filing (Sujeet Indap/Financial Times)
JD.com reports Q1 revenue up 16% YoY to ~$41.8B and net income up 53% YoY to ~$1.5B, driven by Chinese government stimulus measures to boost electronics sales (Bloomberg)
German defense tech startup Helsing unveils an autonomous underwater drone fleet, the SG-1 Fathom, powered by its AI system Lura to detect and classify sounds (Sylvia Pfeifer/Financial Times)
UK retailer M&S says hackers stole customer data in a cyberattack reported on April 22; UK retailers Harrods and Co-op also reported hacks in recent weeks (Nina Kienle/Wall Street Journal)
